text: A U.S. Navy F5L seaplane took off from Hampton Roads, Virginia, using a radio compass for the first time. The pilots located and flew to the Battleship Ohio about 94 miles offshore.
The AK-47 went into production in the Soviet Union -- the name stands for Automatic rifle Kalashnikov model of 1947.
AOL settled lawsuits in California that accused the company of misleading subscribers about monthly service charges.
